column2: "In the atmospherically unstable Sanctum, strong thunderclouds appear. They're called cumulus thunderclouds."
"When encountering these clouds, they will cover and darken the sky as far as the eye can see, sounding thunder."
"Plus, huge bolts of lightning will sometimes flash, bringing about lightning strikes...."
"If I could know the features of the clouds near the lightning strikes, then we may be able to avoid that risk."
"I'm sorry for all of the dangerous investigations. Please get me the data!"
